description: Fortunes built on dominant positions, even outright monopolies; a society in which 1% of the population held 50% of the country's wealth. Among the most enthusiastic admirers of this turn-of-the-century era is none other than Donald Trump.

headline: Macabre video of the last hostages held by Hamas shocks Israel
description: The families of hostages are calling for an end to the war in order to negotiate the release of those still held captive. But the footage has also reinforced support for Benjamin Netanyahu's desire to prolong the war.

headline: For the first time ever, the majority of doctors in France are women
description: Out of 237,214 practicing doctors, there are 118,957 women and 118,257 men as of January 1, according to data from the Directorate for Research, Studies, Evaluation and Statistics. Nonetheless, this increase in female representation within the medical field has not reached all of the highest professional levels.

headline: Mariia Nazarenko's first days in France after fleeing Ukraine: 'In Kyiv, I was a university professor. Today, I am a refugee searching for toothpaste'
description: On February 21, 2022, Nazarenko left Ukraine, thinking it was just for a weekend. The next day, Russia invaded her country. A few days later, she found herself in Lyon. Now 40 years old, she lives in Paris.
